title: Kia India sales up 17 pc in September at 23,523 units
description: Kia India reported a 17% increase in total wholesales for September, reaching 23,523 units, compared to 20,022 units in September 2022. The company attributes this growth to strong customer response during the festive seasons of Ganesh Chaturthi and Onam.
